{{page.title="Purchase Transponder"}}

Private Account

I'm a new customer

If you have started an application before and have a reference number Click here to Apply

I'm an existing customer

I only need an account with the Pinellas Bayway Commuter Plan. Valid only at eligible Bayway facilities.

Private Accounts are for non-commercial users with owned, leased or rented vehicles and/or trailers and must meet the following requirements

  • Maximum of 100 transponders per account
  • One license plate for every transponder purchased (portable transponders are interchangeable with any registered vehicle)
  • Mini sticker transponders must be affixed to the windshield of the registered vehicle
  • Minimum opening balance of $10 + transponder purchase price
  • Single prepaid account balance will be shared by all transponders
  • Lowest toll amount will be paid
  • Account reloaded by Cash, Credit Card or Bank Account

Fleet Account

Commercial Accounts are for companies or businesses with owned, leased or rented vehicles and/or trailers and must meet the following requirements


  • Prepaid application:

• A current Federal Identification Number (FEIN)
• Minimum purchase of 101 transponders
• Minimum opening balance of $1,000 + transponder purchase price
• Minimum replenishment amount is $250
• Minimum of one vehicle and maximum of two vehicles per transponder purchased
• Application subject to review and approval

  • Postpaid application:

• A current Federal Identification Number (FEIN)
• Minimum purchase of 101 transponders
• Minimum of one vehicle and maximum of two vehicles per transponder purchased
• A postpaid account application requires a security bond
• Application subject to review and approval

Click here to Apply

Government Account

Government Accounts are for public agencies at the Federal, State or Local level and must meet the following requirements

  • Minimum of one vehicle and one transponder
  • Requires purchase order
  • Application subject to review and approval Click here to Apply
